summary: Samuel L. Jackson just leaked a big spoiler for ‘Captain Marvel’ and ‘Avengers: Endgame’
title: Samuel L. Jackson just leaked a big spoiler for ‘Captain Marvel’ and ‘Avengers: Endgame’
body:
Oh snap… wait.. oh UN-SNAP.. Thanos is finished!

Samuel L. Jackson is no Tom Holland or Mark Ruffalo when it comes to Avengers leaks, but he certainly seems ready to spoil some details about the upcoming movies. Exactly a month ago, the actor who will reprise his Nick Fury role in at least two Marvel movies this year (Captain Marvel and Spider-Man: Far From Home) casually dropped a huge detail about Captain Marvel. He confirmed that she can…

summary: Avengers: Endgame, alcuni dettagli dalla nuova immagine promozionale
title: Avengers: Endgame, alcuni dettagli dalla nuova immagine promozionale
body:
Avengers: Endgame, alcuni dettagli dalla nuova immagine promozionale

Da quando è uscito Avengers: Infinity War e metà dell’universo è stato decimato da Thanos, inclusi alcuni dei nostri amati supereroi, i fan hanno speculato sui possibili viaggi nel tempo da parte dei restanti supereroi come Iron Man, Capitan America, Black Widow, Hulk, Hawkeye e Thor, tra gli altri.

Infatti, subito dopo l’uscita di Avengers: Infinity War, alcune foto provenienti dal set di Avenge…

summary:
Avengers: Endgame Leaked Suits Concept!
I love the look of the suits! Tony's armor strikes a resemblance to mark 51 from the...
body:
Avengers: Endgame Leaked Suits Concept!

I love the look of the suits! Tony’s armor strikes a resemblance to mark 51 from the comics. The suit he used in the “Invincible. Iron Man” series. Since mark 50 was used in Infinity War, maybe this is Marvel’s version of mark 51. If it is, we can assume it has the same features with the nanotech.

Hulk’s suit looks similar to the one we saw in the concept art just like the rest of the suits. People started to theorize that Hulk could take on his Professer Hulk role from the comics, and there is a high chance he could. Professor Hulk is basically Hulk and Banner working together to retain both Hulk’s strength and Banner’s smarts at the same time. It’s a very interesting concept isn’t it?

Thor’s suit is similar to the one he donned in Avengers: Infinity War if not the same. Cap has that same Avengers logo we saw in Age of Ultron now that the remaining Avengers have reunited as a proper team. Clint is rocking a badass haircut. The five look good.

summary: So I watched infinity war with my dad today (a man who has only ever seen hoco and black panther out of all the mcu films) so...
body:
So I watched infinity war with my dad today (a man who has only ever seen hoco and black panther out of all the mcu films) so I’m sharing some of the comments he made whilst we were watching:

- *sees Loki in the opening* “is that Thor?”

- “IDRIS ELBA?!”

- *laughs at literally everything tony says*

- *steve’s opening scene at the station* “who’s that? CAPTAIN AMERICA?” *muttering* “that doesn’t look like captain america”

- “Why are they giving the homeless guy an arm? What’s wrong with the one he has? HE DOESNT HAVE AN ARM?! What happened to you homeless man?”

- *gamora dies* “they’re not going to have enough characters for a sequel at this rate”

- *doctor strange hands over the time stone* “is it a fake? It’s probably a bomb”

- *everyone starts turning to dust* “NOT BLACK PANTHER! HE WAS THE ONLY GOOD ONE”

- *movie ends* “why would they do that?” *stares out of window*

summary: How Tony Stark Survives ‘Avengers: Endgame’ – Revealed?
title: How Tony Stark Survives ‘Avengers: Endgame’ – Revealed?
body:
OMG… Thoughts?

The new footage of Avengers: Endgame which debuted during the Super Bowl may reveal how Tony Stark will survive being stranded in space.

The first Endgame trailer shows Iron Man drifting helplessly, a day away from running out of oxygen. The situation looks pretty dire, but luckily Tony is not alone – the TV spot shows Nebula lending him a helping hand as the pair work on something together.…

summary: Avengers: Endgame -L'evoluzione nel tempo del quartier generale dei Vendicatori
title: Avengers: Endgame -L'evoluzione nel tempo del quartier generale dei Vendicatori
body:
Avengers: Endgame -L’evoluzione nel tempo del quartier generale dei Vendicatori

Da Avengers: Age of Ultron ad oggi, il quartier generale dei Vendicatori ha attraverso molte evoluzioni, l’ultima delle quali con Avengers: Endgame.

Grazie ad una nuova immagine dal set di Avengers: Endgame, siamo oggi in grado di poter apprezzare “quasi” nel dettaglio l’ultima evoluzione strutturale del celebre quartier generale degli Avengers. Ma come anticipato all’inizio di questo…

blog.name: mrdaps
blog.title: Mr. DAPs
blog.description:
Hi there!

I am Mr. DAPs, that guy with the hat that walks around Disneyland. I will mainly be posting some pictures that I have taken that I particularly like here but will occasionally post some other things.

You can read some of my other posts at any or all of the links below:

Blog: mrdaps.com
Website: dapsmagic.com
Twitter: twitter.com/mrdaps
Facebook: facebook.com/misterdaps

Please feel free to add me on any or all of the above links. I look forward to chatting with you and seeing you in the park!

Make it a GREAT day!

-Mr. DAPs

summary: A Magical Nite - DISNEY Reporter
title: A Magical Nite - DISNEY Reporter
body:
A Magical Nite – DISNEY Reporter

Welcome to another edition of DISNEY Reporter. Each week the top Disney and geek headlines are shared. This week, there was a lot of ground to cover. From the Super Bowl to Disney Parks news, to other entertainment news, there were a lot of things going on from around the Walt Disney Company. Let’s take a look at this week’s headlines!

summary: Doctor Strange might’ve spent over 5,000 years peering through time to undo ‘Infinity War’ deaths
title: Doctor Strange might’ve spent over 5,000 years peering through time to undo ‘Infinity War’ deaths
body:
THIS IS A CRAZY NEW THEORY!!

No matter how heartbreaking the win over Thanos will be in Avengers: Endgame, one thing is certain: Doctor Strange is the architect of this win. I’m not just talking about the events in Infinity War that needed to happen in a certain way in order for the Avengers to actually beat the Titan in the next movie, but of other events from all the other Marvel movies, which may have been set up in a…

summary: Avengers: Endgame - Le locandine ispirate all'horror Noi
title: Avengers: Endgame - Le locandine ispirate all'horror Noi
body:
Avengers: Endgame – Le locandine ispirate all’horror Noi

Il 2019 sarà un anno interessante per quanto riguarda le uscite cinematografiche, e Avengers: Endgame e l’horror Noi sono sicuramente tra queste.

In questo nostro nuovo articolo vogliamo mostrarvi la grande idea avuta da un grafico, il quale ha scelto di fondere i due film … almeno graficamente. Utilizzando lo stile della locandina scelta nei giorni scorsi per l’horror Noi (qui l’articolo),…
